Articles.Content:
I've downloaded a lot of mods and installed them (I think correctly) but when the game is loading it just crashes.

If someone knows what I should do I would really appreciate it.

Also, I don't really know how to upload error file etc. so if someone could help me with that I'd be happy.

Don't you too just HATE quoting yourself, especially over and over and over again?

On 31-7-2017 at 10:28 PM, Tex_NL said:

As usual at least 95% of all mod related issues are caused by (in order of likelihood):

  1. Incompatible or outdated mods.
  2. Incorrect installation
  3. Missing or conflicting dependencies.

In other words:

  1. Only install mods that are compatible with your current KSP version. Old (not updated) mods might not work on the latest KSP while updated mods might not work on older KSP versions.
  2. Closely follow the installation instructions!
  3. If a mod description states it is dependant on an other mod accept that statement as a fact. You WILL need it.

 

Edited August 5, 2017 by Tex_NL

23 hours ago, Tex_NL said:

Don't you too just HATE quoting yourself, especially over and over and over again?

 

Okay thanks, I don't really know what you mean with quoting yourself but ok.

I'll look if all the mods are correctly installed and if they're the nright version.
